channel.title: Login Error for client?
channel.description:
Error: Class68_Sub13_Sub15:259 Login:254 client:790 Applet_Sub1:485 Applet_Sub1: 156 Thread:662 | java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 error_game_crash Shutdown complete - clean:true
I keep getting that error when i try and log in. Ive been able to log on to my server before. But then this started randomly happening.. Help?
